Example: Granting Entitlement to Additional Compensation for a Dependent Effective the Date of a Life Event
Scenario
:
VA assigns a combined disability evaluation of 30 percent to a Veteran effective April 21, 2010, and notifies her of potential entitlement to additional compensation for dependents on May 1, 2010.
On August 12, 2011, VA receives a completed
VA Form 21-686c
showing the Veteran gave birth to a baby girl on December 23, 2010.
Action
:Â  Grant entitlement to additional compensation for the child effective December 23, 2010.
